title: SUI Yield Token
short: The first passive asset backed by stablecoin, increasing in value over time that shorts against all SUI fixed-yield vault rewards.
long: The passive asset from Legato that increases in value over time by collecting accrued rewards from all SUI fixed-yield vaults on a surplus and burn YT tokens from the circulation supply. The tokens are initially listed on the internal AMM where anyone can use stablecoin to acquire them.

title: SUI Fixed 2% Yield APR-24
short: Convert SUI or Staked SUI objects into future derivative tradable tokens that able to migrate to any vault's PT when possible
long: This vault converts SUI tokens or staked SUI objects staked on whitelisted validators to future tradable derivative fungible PT-APR_2024 tokens that represent their future value with the vault's fixed staking rates. PT tokens received can be burned and minted into the next upcoming vault's PT when possible.

title: SUI Fixed 2.2% Yield JUN-24
short: Convert SUI into tradable future value on 14-JUN-24 with a fixed rate, always have the option to migrate to the next vault when possible
long: This vault converts SUI tokens or staked SUI objects staked on whitelisted validators to future tradable derivative fungible PT-JUN_2024 tokens that represent their future value with the vault's fixed staking rates. PT tokens received can be burned and minted into the next upcoming vault's PT when possible.
